CITY COUNCIL MEETING

REGULAR CITY COUNCIL MEETINGS OCCUR THE 1st & 3rd TUESDAYS OF EACH MONTH

Meetings are held at City Hall in the Council Chambers – 501 North Madison, Mount Pleasant, TX 75455 . The public are welcome to attend with limited seating.

Agendas for this meeting can be downloaded from our Agenda/Minutes page.

You can also watch the meeting via our YouTube video stream (opens in a new window).

  • + Add to Google Calendar
  • + iCal / Outlook export

CITY COUNCIL MEETING

City Hall
Feb 05 2026 8:00 am - 9:30 am
